/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street itself is a vibrant display of urban life, lined with lush green trees that provide a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sun, positioned in the top right corner of the image, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene, enhancing the colors and details. The image is a testament to the harmonious blend of nature and urban development in Beijing.
